Jennifer Lawrence Liburan ke Sumba, Bisa Wisata ke Mana Saja?
06 Nov 2019, 20:00 by Bonauli


Jennifer Lawrence sedang liburan ke Sumba. (Pascal Le Segretain/Getty Images)

Jakarta - Artis kondang Jennifer Lawrence ke Sumba untuk berbulan madu dengan suami. Ada banyak destinasi menarik di Sumba, mungkin JLaw bisa main ke beberapa tempat ini.Setelah menikah dengan Cooke Maroney di Pulau Rhode Sabtu (9/10) lalu, Jennifer Lawrence tak menunda untuk honey moon. Tempat bulan madu yang jadi pilihannya adalah Sumba.Di Sumba, Jennifer dan suami menginap di Sumba Nihi Resort yang terkenal mewah. Kamar yang dipilih pasangan ini memiliki fasilitas kolam pribadi dan pemandangan laut yang sangat cantik. Menurut media internasional People, mereka menginap di Mendaka, tempat yang pernah disinggahi Christian Bale. Jennifer Lawrence dan Maroney juga pergi untuk menunggang kuda. Mereka pun mengunjungi desa-desa di Sumba yang tak jauh dari tempat menginap.


Foto: (@nihisumba/Instagram)

Bicara soal aktivitas wisata di Sumba, paling tidak ada beberapa tempat populer yang bisa didatangi pasangan ini. Menginap di Resort Nihi Sumba, Jennifer Lawrence bisa berkunjung ke Desa Adat Prai Ijing. Jennifer Lawrence cuma perlu menempuh waktu sekitar 30 menit dari hotel.Sumba sendiri punya Pantai Mbawana yang jadi ikon untuk melihat sunset. Dengan waktu tempuh sekitar 1 jam dari Sumba Nihi Resort, Pantai Mbawana jadi pilihan. Pasih putih dan karang-karang bolongnya senantiasa jadi magnet wisatawan dan juga bakal memesona Jennifer Lawrence dan suami. Dengan keindahan alam Sumba yang seakan tak ada habisnya, Jennifer Lawrence bisa pula menyambangi Danau Weekuri yang juga populer sebagai tempat wisata di sana. Berada di Sumba barat, jarak tempuh tempat ini sekitar 2,5 jam dari hotelnya.


Foto: (Agus Supriono/d'traveler)

Meski cukup memakan waktu, namun keindahan laguna ini patut diacungi jempol. Air yang berwarna toska akan semakin indah jika dilihat dari ketinggian. Bentuknya juga seperti hati lho.Itu baru di Sumba Barat. Kalau Jennifer Lawrence mau jalan-jalan ke wilayah timur, ada Bukit Wairinding yang juga tak kalah memesona. Di bulan-bulan ini, Bukit Wairinding akan berwarna kehijauan dan sangat cantik untuk difoto.


Foto: Triyani Agustina/d'Traveler

Kalau bicara Sumba rasanya tak lengkap tanpa pantai pohon menari alias Walakiri. Saat matahari terbenam dan air perlahan pasang, Walakiri bisa jadi spot foto terbaik untuk dipamerkan. Bakal jadi kenangan indah buat Jennifer Lawrence!Semoga saja Jennifer dan suami berkunjung ke tempat-tempat ini. Dijamin makin jatuh cinta dengan Sumba!


Foto: (Titri Frilyani/d'Traveler)

Jennifer Lawrence Vacation to Sumba, Can Travel Anywhere?
Nov 6 2019, 8:00 PM by Bonauli


Jennifer Lawrence is on vacation to Sumba. (Pascal Le Segretain / Getty Images)

Jakarta - Famous artist Jennifer Lawrence to Sumba for a honeymoon with her husband. There are many interesting destinations on Sumba, maybe JLaw can play to some of these places. After getting married to Cooke Maroney on Rhode Island last Saturday (9/10), Jennifer Lawrence did not delay the honey moon. The honeymoon place that became his choice was Sumba. In Sumba, Jennifer and her husband stayed at the famous luxury Sumba Nihi Resort. The room chosen by the couple has private pool facilities and a very beautiful sea view. According to international media People, they stayed overnight in Mendaka, a place that Christian Bale once visited. Jennifer Lawrence and Maroney also went to ride horses. They also visited villages in Sumba not far from where they were staying.


Photo: (@ nihisumba / Instagram)

Speaking of tourist activities on Sumba, there are at least a few popular places this couple can go to. Staying at the Nihi Sumba Resort, Jennifer Lawrence can visit the Prai Ijing Indigenous Village. Jennifer Lawrence only needs to take about 30 minutes from the hotel. Sumba itself has Mbawana Beach which is an icon to see the sunset. With a travel time of about 1 hour from Sumba Nihi Resort, Mbawana Beach is a choice. Pasih putih and perforated corals are always a tourist magnet and will also fascinate Jennifer Lawrence and her husband. With Sumba's seemingly endless natural beauty, Jennifer Lawrence can also visit Lake Weekuri which is also popular as a tourist spot there. Located in West Sumba, the distance of this place is around 2.5 hours from the hotel.


Photo: (Agus Supriono / d'traveler)

Although quite time consuming, but the beauty of this lagoon deserves a thumbs up. Turquoise water will be more beautiful when viewed from a height. The shape is also like a heart. That's new in West Sumba. If Jennifer Lawrence wants to travel east, there is Wairinding Hill which is no less charming. In these months, Bukit Wairinding will be greenish and very beautiful to be photographed.


Photo: Triyani Agustina / d'Traveler

When it comes to Sumba it feels incomplete without the dancing beach tree alias Walakiri. As the sun goes down and the water slowly rises, Walakiri can be the best photo spot to show off. Will be a wonderful memory for Jennifer Lawrence! Hopefully Jennifer and her husband visit these places. Guaranteed to be more in love with Sumba!


Photo: (Titri Frilyani / d'Traveler)
